item.title: How to create a bootable Windows 10 USB stick
item.author: Auteur
item.description: Maybe you bought a new computer and reinstall it from scratch, or maybe you plan to sell your current computer, or maybe you just want to install Windows 10 as a new OS. In Any case, creating a bootable Windows USB stick will allow you to do so. It could be harder This might sound scary, but it as actually very easy. However, please note that, for this method to work you’ll need to proceed from a Windows 10 computer.

item.title: How to Install Kodi in Windows
item.author: Auteur
item.description: During this short video, I’ll show you #how to install #kodi (formerly know as #xbmc). It is a simple 2 steps process : downloading the software ; installing it. First, fire up your favorite browser and naivgate to kodi.tv, click on the Downloads link and select the Windows version. Wait for download to finish. Then, run the installer and just click “Next” until the installation is complete.
